summary: A lonely wife secretly starts an affair with a female dance teacher, at the distress of her husband.
cast: Hélène Fillières|Raffaëla Anderson|Anthony Delon|Jeannick Gravelines|William Wayolle|Karole Rocher|Thierno Sy|Roselyne Delpuech|Thierry Nzeutem|Francine Robillard|Mathias Thibérioz|Riton Liebman|Léo Drif|Knzo
title: Un amour de femme
